smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i)UPI/DR/(?:[0-9])*/(?:[0-9]|[a-z])*/[[to]]/(?:[0-9]|[a-z]| )*is successful! Your A/c has been debited by Rs. [[amount]] on [[date]]. Your.*
(?i)UPI/CR/(?:[0-9])*/(?:[0-9]|[a-z])*/[[to]]/(?:[0-9]|[a-z]| )*is successful! Your A/c has been credited by Rs. [[amount]] on [[date]]. Your.*
(?i).* A/c [[account]] debited with Rs.[[amount]] on [[date]]. Info: [^/]*/[^/]*/[^/]*/[^/]*/[[to]]/.*. .*
(?i).*A/c [[account]] credited with Rs.[[amount]] on [[date]]. Info: [^/]*/[^/]*/[^/]*/[^/]*/[[to]]/.*. Avl.*
(?i).* A/c [[account]] is debited with Rs. *[[amount]] on [[date]]. For more information .*
